author: neilg
msg: fix static initialization problems, bug 28517; thanks to Reid Spencer

author: neilg
msg: make sure locally-declared attributes have declarations in the PSVI

author: neilg
msg: On some platforms, it is problematic to throw a different exception from inside the catch block of another exception

author: neilg
msg: Since parseContent may now be called outside a constructor,
the destructor may subsequently be invoked.  If this happens,
an attempt will be made to delete fRawData if it is non-zero.
Therefore, 0 it before throwing the exception after cleanUp() is called.
